title: Belt, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warp
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 228 x 11 cm (7 ft. 5 3/4 in. x 4 5/16 in.)
description: Belt with one surface of dark blue wool fancy twill with echelons forming large diamonds. The reverse side, white cotton cloth with large diamonds outlined with the dark blue wool warps which surface the reverse. Narrow border of checks at each end with plain guard strips above and below; two sets of plaited fringes, one wool, the other, cotton.

tombstone.epitaph:
Belt, early 20th century.Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: plain weave with supplementary warp. 1952-38-1.
